headline: Everest Enhances Board of Directors with Appointment of Allan Levine
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, June 23, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. (NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing best-in-class property, casualty, and specialty reinsurance and insurance solutions, announced that Allan Levine has been appointed as an independent, non-executive member of its Board of Directors.
